review: I recently cut the cord from cable and the Fire TV Stick works exactly as advertised to help with this. Set up took less than 5 minutes and the home menu is easy to navigate. I am able to stream content from all the major providers with no problems. I especially like the remote that is intuitive and has a great design. Could not be happier with this product!
author: Jon O.

review: I use this on my already smart tv.  It allows me to see the movie titles full screen vs the 1/8 wedge that is presized from my television
author: Mike

review: Had a Roku stick before this and this one is much better.  It is faster and more responsive.  I think the Roku had more app choices though, but I would definitely buy this again for the Roku stick.
